enabled.description: Specifies whether the collector should collect logs.

includeCollectorLogs.description: Specifies whether the collector should collect its own logs.

storeCheckpoints.description: Specifies whether logs checkpoints should be stored in /var/lib/otelcol/ host directory.

maxRecombineLogSize.description: Specifies the max recombine log size.

enabled.description: Specifies whether the collector should collect host metrics.
Specifies whether the collector should collect kubelet metrics.
Specifies whether the collector should add Kubernetes metdata to resource attributes.

extractAllPodLabels.description: Specifies whether the k8sattributes processor should extract all pod labels.

extractAllPodAnnotations.description: Specifies whether the k8sattributes processor should extract all pod annotations.

enabled.description: Specifies whether the collector should collect Kubernetes objects.

disableLeaderElection.description: Specifies whether the collector should use leader election extension to collect Kubernetes objects.

enabled.description: Specifies whether the collector should collect cluster metrics.

disableLeaderElection.description: Specifies whether the collector should use leader election extension to collect cluster metrics.

image.description: Image use in both standalone and agent configs
Image use in both standalone and agent configs

^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$.description: Selector labels used to match the service to pods.

selector.description: Labels to select pods for the service.
